_header: Saint Mary Magdalene lady fair and bright
Subjects: prayers, to saints; Mary Magdalene, saint
_description: A prayer to St. Mary Magdalene — three monorhyming quatrains

BLHar667.First Lines:
Seint marie magdalene lady ffair and brithgAl crestendam clere
                    thoroth þi gostly lithg…
BLHar667.Last Lines:
…Off þem þat þou wille defend þer be dampned
                    noneI besekkithe þat on me & on my frendes ilkone
BLHar667.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “A Middle English Prayer to St. Mary Magdalen.” 
             Traditio
         24 (1968): 458-64: 458.
